title: Faction Fleets
full_text:
Faction Fleets

System Fleets
System Fleets are an event where a group of Lycentian, Kavani, Foralkan, or Mining Guild ships spawn. They will fly around the planet's warp hub for a time before warping to another planet, engaging any enemy players or NPCs. They can range from a few fighters and a corvette to an armada with over eight cruisers and many support ships.
Unlike Drone Fleets, they do not have multiple waves, nor a leader that drops special loot.
Defense Fleets
Defense Fleets are the group of ships surrounding a faction station. They do not warp, and they will attack hostile NPCs and players. More and larger ships will spawn depending on the importance of the station.
Reinforcement Fleets
Reinforcement Fleets spawn in Contested Systems when a player activates a reinforcement beacon. These fleets will warp in on the beacon, and then warp to attack shield generators. See Faction Warfare for more information.
Hangar Fleets
Hangar Fleets spawn in Contested Systems from a Hangar structure. They patrol the system and defend it from enemy players and NPCs.
